name: Six Sides (romes)
description:
This game was made for the TV Game Jam. Everything but the font was made during the jam.

Here's a link for the song: https://soundcloud.com/romesrift/six-sides

It was inspired by the episode "Remedial Chaos Theory" from the show "Community".

When rolling a die to choose who gets pizza, you are creating 6 different timelines. 

Press Space to clear text panels.

You can play all of them, originally they would be all different, however because of time limitations, different timelines have different difficulties for the same gameplay.

In each timeline you must click the right keys along the song that's playing. Get enough score to please the gods and get your pizza!
